job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Step into the role of Digital Business Developer at ABN AMRO's Personal Banking. Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences. Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services. If creating customer-centric solutions excites you, this is your chance to make a difference!, As a Digital Business Developer, you will be part of a specialized team with other Business Developers. You will focus on improving the user experience of our clients in our digital channels (app & web). You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions. These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations. Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies., The Grid Digital Channels Personal Banking has about 400 professionals from over 25 nationalities. The spoken language is Dutch and English. We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives. At this moment, we are working hybrid from home and some days at the Gustav Mahlerlaan in Amsterdam. We believe that a flexible approach with multidisciplinary teams focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation. You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid. Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
     * Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.
     * Informal atmosphere with lots of room for fun.
     * An environment that simulates to embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
     * Working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.

   We know one thing about the future of banking: it is all about being a personal bank in a digital age. Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content. That is why we work hard at ABN AMRO to bring our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve., We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
   If you are interested in this role, let's arrange to meet to see how your profile matches what we are looking for.
   For job related questions you can contact Manouk Klaassen (a.i. Lead PO Business Developer Pool). We look forward to meeting you!

Equal opportunities for all

   The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.
job_details.full_text:
Digital Business Developer

Step into the role of Digital Business Developer at ABN AMRO's Personal Banking. Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences. Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services. If creating customer-centric solutions excites you, this is your chance to make a difference!, As a Digital Business Developer, you will be part of a specialized team with other Business Developers. You will focus on improving the user experience of our clients in our digital channels (app & web). You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions. These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations. Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies., The Grid Digital Channels Personal Banking has about 400 professionals from over 25 nationalities. The spoken language is Dutch and English. We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives. At this moment, we are working hybrid from home and some days at the Gustav Mahlerlaan in Amsterdam. We believe that a flexible approach with multidisciplinary teams focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation. You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid. Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
     * Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.
     * Informal atmosphere with lots of room for fun.
     * An environment that simulates to embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
     * Working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.

   We know one thing about the future of banking: it is all about being a personal bank in a digital age. Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content. That is why we work hard at ABN AMRO to bring our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve., We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
   If you are interested in this role, let's arrange to meet to see how your profile matches what we are looking for.
   For job related questions you can contact Manouk Klaassen (a.i. Lead PO Business Developer Pool). We look forward to meeting you!

Equal opportunities for all

   The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on business development, client needs analysis, and improving user experience within digital channels. While it mentions 'digital transformation' and 'latest developments in technology', it lacks specific technical responsibilities, AI/ML modeling tasks, or engineering roles that would align with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. The emphasis is on business strategy and solution conceptualization rather than technical implementation or model development, fitting the 'Ambiguous' profile as a non-technical or primarily business-focused role.

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as 'Digital Business Developer' with a focus on 'driving digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences', 'strategic recommendations', and 'translating customer needs into value propositions'.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences

job_tasks.justification: The core of the role involves improving user experience by translating customer needs into solutions, considering various stakeholder requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role requires aligning solutions with technological, digital, legislative, and regulatory developments, as well as stakeholder requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations

job_tasks.justification: The role is involved in the 'entire process from initial concept to final implementation' of solutions, which implies involvement in the development lifecycle, albeit from a business/product perspective.
job_tasks.phrase: These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation

job_tasks.justification: The job is situated within a team responsible for 'Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives', indicating a focus on business strategy within digital products.
job_tasks.phrase: responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working in a 'pool of Business Developers' with a focus on improving digital offerings and customer experience.
job_tasks.phrase: pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes the future of banking being 'all about being a personal bank in a digital age' and the role of digital channels in providing personalized content and seamless experiences.
job_tasks.phrase: Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content.

job_tasks.justification: The role is looking for someone with an 'affinity for customer experience' to enhance the digital offering.
job_tasks.phrase: affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
